get_fits¶

tessilator.tessilator.get_fits(scc)[source]¶

Function which returns a list of fits files corresponding to a given Sector, Camera and CCD configuration

Parameters:
sector_numint

Sector number required

cclist, size=2

List of [a, b], where a is the Camera number (1-4) and b is the CCD number (1-4)

Returns:
fits_fileslist

A list of the fits files to be used for aperture photometry
